body.body: The seal has a covering of a powder lubricant that could get into the eyes or be inhaled. When removing or fitting the seal always wear protective equipment for the eyes and a mask to cover the nose and mouth.
Failure to follow the above warning may result in personal injury.
Care must be taken when removing or fitting the seal. Excessive force may damage the electrical connector of the coil or the seal.
The removal and installation of the new seal must take place in a clean environment.
Do not reuse the seal after it has been removed from the coil, always fit a new seal.
Do not use tools to remove the seal, the seal must be removed by hand.
Using finger pressure only, fit the seal positioned as shown below.
Check that the cap for the spark plug is fitted to the coil correctly as shown below.
When the coil is fitted to the engine, ensure the seal mates correctly with the camshaft cover.

title: Ignition Coil Seal - Installation
